alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:26PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 500 PM PDT... At 425 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oasis. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oasis, including I-80 and Silver Zone Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
